deckInfo.name: Chinese Learning - My Little Apple v1::Level 1 - Building Blocks::Listening
deckInfo.description: Audio-first cards building from characters to compounds to key phrases from 'My Little Apple' - comprehensive vocabulary coverage

conceptGroups.description: Essential personal pronouns from the song

cards.back:
我 (wǒ)

I, me

First person pronoun - the singer

你 (nǐ)

you

Second person pronoun - the beloved

你的 (nǐ de)

your, yours

你 + 的 = you + possessive particle

我的 (wǒ de)

my, mine

我 + 的 = I + possessive particle

conceptGroups.description: Vocabulary about planting, seeds, and growth from the opening verse

cards.back:
种 (zhòng)

plant, grow

To plant seeds or crops

种下 (zhòng xià)

plant, sow

种 + 下 = plant + down/place

种子 (zhǒngzi)

seed

What you plant to grow something

一颗 (yīkē)

one (for round objects)

一 + 颗 = one + classifier for seeds/pearls

终于 (zhōngyú)

finally, at last

After waiting, something happens

长出 (zhǎngchū)

grow out, sprout

长 + 出 = grow + out/emerge

果实 (guǒshí)

fruit, result

The fruit that grows from seeds

conceptGroups.description: All time-related vocabulary from the song

cards.back:
今天 (jīntiān)

today

今 + 天 = present + day

每 (měi)

every, each

Used with time words

天 (tiān)

day, sky

Time unit or heaven

每天 (měi tiān)

every day

每 + 天 = every + day

日子 (rìzi)

day, date

A period of time or special day

明天 (míngtiān)

tomorrow

明 + 天 = bright + day

每个 (měi ge)

every, each

每 + 个 = every + classifier

conceptGroups.description: Spring, summer, autumn, winter from the bridge section

cards.back:
春天 (chūntiān)

spring

春 + 天 = spring + season

夏天 (xiàtiān)

summer

夏 + 天 = summer + season

秋天 (qiūtiān)

autumn, fall

秋 + 天 = autumn + season

冬天 (dōngtiān)

winter

冬 + 天 = winter + season

夜晚 (yèwǎn)

night, evening

夜 + 晚 = night + late

黄昏 (huánghūn)

dusk, twilight

The time when sky turns yellow

conceptGroups.description: Heavenly bodies mentioned in the romantic verses

cards.back:
太阳 (tàiyáng)

sun

太 + 阳 = great + yang

月亮 (yuèliàng)

moon

月 + 亮 = moon + bright

星星 (xīngxīng)

stars

星 + 星 = star + star (reduplicated)

阳光 (yángguāng)

sunlight, sunshine

阳 + 光 = yang + light

天边 (tiānbiān)

horizon, edge of sky

天 + 边 = sky + edge

conceptGroups.description: Color words and visual descriptions from the song

cards.back:
红 (hóng)

red

The color red

红红的 (hóng hóng de)

red, reddish

红 + 红 + 的 = red + red + adjective marker

白 (bái)

white

The color white

白云 (báiyún)

white clouds

白 + 云 = white + clouds

蓝 (lán)

blue

The color blue

蓝天 (lántiān)

blue sky

蓝 + 天 = blue + sky

金色 (jīnsè)

golden, gold color

金 + 色 = gold + color

黄 (huáng)

yellow

The color yellow

conceptGroups.description: Building the central metaphor of the song

cards.back:
小 (xiǎo)

small, little

Used in: 小苹果 (little apple)

苹果 (píngguǒ)

apple

The fruit apple

小苹果 (xiǎo píngguǒ)

little apple

The central metaphor - term of endearment

小呀小 (xiǎo ya xiǎo)

little oh little

小 + 呀 + 小 = little + exclamation + little

苹果儿 (píngguǒr)

little apple (cute form)

苹果 + 儿 = apple + diminutive suffix

conceptGroups.description: Key verbs expressing love, emotion, and relationships

cards.back:
爱 (ài)

love

The central emotion of the song

喜欢 (xǐhuān)

like, enjoy

喜 + 欢 = happy + joyful

欢喜 (huānxǐ)

joy, happiness

欢 + 喜 = joyful + happy

讨厌 (tǎoyàn)

dislike, hate

讨 + 厌 = seek + disgust

觉得 (juéde)

feel, think

To have an opinion or feeling

conceptGroups.description: Verbs about giving, taking, and exchanging

cards.back:
送 (sòng)

give, send

To give as a gift

送给 (sòng gěi)

give to

送 + 给 = give + to

给 (gěi)

give, to

Can be verb 'give' or preposition 'to/for'

摘 (zhāi)

pick, pluck

To pick fruit or flowers

摘下 (zhāi xià)

pick off, pluck down

摘 + 下 = pick + down

拽 (zhuāi)

pull, drag

To pull down forcefully

拽下 (zhuāi xià)

pull down, drag down

拽 + 下 = pull + down

献 (xiàn)

offer, dedicate

To offer respectfully

献给 (xiàn gěi)

dedicate to, offer to

献 + 给 = dedicate + to

收获 (shōuhuò)

harvest, reap

收 + 获 = collect + obtain

conceptGroups.description: Core verbs like 'to be' and 'to become'

cards.back:
是 (shì)

is, are, am

The most important verb 'to be'

变 (biàn)

change, become

To transform or change

变成 (biàn chéng)

become, turn into

变 + 成 = change + complete

变得 (biàn de)

become, get (adjective)

变 + 得 = change + result

有 (yǒu)

have, there is

Possession or existence

让 (ràng)

let, make, allow

To cause or allow something

conceptGroups.description: Words about light, fire, brightness, and illumination

cards.back:
蜡烛 (làzhú)

candle

蜡 + 烛 = wax + candle

燃烧 (ránshāo)

burn, combust

燃 + 烧 = ignite + burn

照亮 (zhàoliàng)

illuminate, light up

照 + 亮 = shine + bright

点 (diǎn)

light, ignite, point

To light a fire or candle

点亮 (diǎn liàng)

light up, ignite

点 + 亮 = light + bright

火 (huǒ)

fire

Fire or flame

亮 (liàng)

bright, light

Brightness or illumination

光 (guāng)

light, ray

Light or radiance

灿 (càn)

brilliant, bright

Brilliant or splendid

灿烂 (cànlàn)

brilliant, splendid

灿 + 烂 = brilliant + splendid

conceptGroups.description: Words about darkness, night, and contrast with light

cards.back:
黑 (hēi)

black, dark

The color black or darkness

黑夜 (hēiyè)

dark night

黑 + 夜 = black + night

黑暗 (hēi'àn)

dark, darkness

黑 + 暗 = black + dark

夜 (yè)

night

Nighttime

conceptGroups.description: Mountains, fields, flowers, and natural scenery

cards.back:
山 (shān)

mountain, hill

A mountain or hill

山坡 (shānpō)

hillside, slope

山 + 坡 = mountain + slope

花 (huā)

flower

A flower or blossom

花丛 (huācóng)

flower bed, cluster of flowers

花 + 丛 = flower + cluster

开 (kāi)

open, bloom

To open or bloom (flowers)

开满 (kāi mǎn)

bloom all over

开 + 满 = bloom + full

盛开 (shèngkāi)

bloom luxuriantly

盛 + 开 = flourish + bloom

麦 (mài)

wheat

Wheat grain

麦田 (màitián)

wheat field

麦 + 田 = wheat + field

云 (yún)

cloud

Clouds in the sky

云朵 (yúnduǒ)

cloud

云 + 朵 = cloud + classifier for flowers/clouds

雪 (xuě)

snow

Snow or snowflakes

雪花 (xuěhuā)

snowflake

雪 + 花 = snow + flower

飞舞 (fēiwǔ)

dance in the air, flutter

飞 + 舞 = fly + dance

conceptGroups.description: Verbs describing movement, walking, and activities

cards.back:
漫 (màn)

roam, wander

To wander leisurely

漫步 (mànbù)

stroll, walk leisurely

漫 + 步 = wander + step

徜 (cháng)

wander, roam

To wander freely

徉 (yáng)

roam, wander

To roam about

徜徉 (chángyáng)

wander, roam freely

徜 + 徉 = wander + roam

陪 (péi)

accompany, stay with

To be with someone

看 (kàn)

look, watch, see

To look at or watch

眨 (zhǎ)

blink, wink

To blink eyes

眨眼 (zhǎyǎn)

blink, wink

眨 + 眼 = blink + eye

升起 (shēngqǐ)

rise, ascend

升 + 起 = rise + begin

来 (lái)

come, arrive

To come or arrive

来到 (láidào)

arrive at, come to

来 + 到 = come + arrive

又 (yòu)

again, also

Once more or also

conceptGroups.description: Parts of the body mentioned in the song

cards.back:
脸 (liǎn)

face

The face

小脸 (xiǎoliǎn)

little face

小 + 脸 = small + face

小脸儿 (xiǎoliǎnr)

little face (cute form)

小脸 + 儿 = little face + diminutive

心 (xīn)

heart

The heart or mind

心窝 (xīnwō)

heart (affectionate)

心 + 窝 = heart + nest

眼 (yǎn)

eye

The eye

自 (zì)

self, oneself

Reflexive pronoun

自己 (zìjǐ)

oneself, myself

自 + 己 = self + self

conceptGroups.description: Adjectives describing beauty, greatness, and qualities

cards.back:
伟 (wěi)

great, grand

Magnificent or great

大 (dà)

big, great

Large or important

伟大 (wěidà)

great, magnificent

伟 + 大 = great + big

美 (měi)

beautiful

Beauty or beautiful

最 (zuì)

most, -est

Superlative marker

最美 (zuì měi)

most beautiful

最 + 美 = most + beautiful

温 (wēn)

warm

Warm temperature

暖 (nuǎn)

warm

Warm and cozy

温暖 (wēnnuǎn)

warm, cozy

温 + 暖 = warm + warm

新 (xīn)

new, fresh

New or recent

新鲜 (xīnxiān)

fresh, new

新 + 鲜 = new + fresh

更 (gèng)

more, even more

Comparative marker

更加 (gèngjiā)

even more, all the more

更 + 加 = more + add

conceptGroups.description: Abstract concepts about hope, meaning, and life

cards.back:
希 (xī)

hope

Hope or expectation

望 (wàng)

hope, wish

Hope or desire

希望 (xīwàng)

hope, wish

希 + 望 = hope + wish

生 (shēng)

life, birth

Life or living

命 (mìng)

life, fate

Life or destiny

生命 (shēngmìng)

life

生 + 命 = birth + life

意 (yì)

meaning, intention

Meaning or will

意义 (yìyì)

meaning, significance

意 + 义 = meaning + righteousness

有意义 (yǒu yìyì)

meaningful, significant

有 + 意义 = have + meaning

conceptGroups.description: Words about forever, permanence, and duration

cards.back:
永 (yǒng)

forever, eternal

Eternal or permanent

远 (yuǎn)

far, distant

Distant in space or time

永远 (yǒngyuǎn)

forever, always

永 + 远 = eternal + far

虽 (suī)

although, though

Although or even though

短 (duǎn)

short, brief

Short in length or time

虽短 (suī duǎn)

although short

虽 + 短 = although + short

conceptGroups.description: Words about leaving, staying, and loyalty

cards.back:
离 (lí)

leave, depart

To leave or separate from

弃 (qì)

abandon, give up

To abandon or forsake

不 (bù)

not, no

Negation particle

不离 (bù lí)

not leave

不 + 离 = not + leave

不弃 (bù qì)

not abandon

不 + 弃 = not + abandon

不离不弃 (bù lí bù qì)

never abandon, stay loyal

不离 + 不弃 = not leave + not abandon

conceptGroups.description: Words about how much, extent, and quantity

cards.back:
怎 (zěn)

how

Question word for manner

么 (me)

what (question particle)

Question particle

怎么 (zěnme)

how, why

怎 + 么 = how + what

都 (dōu)

all, both

Inclusive particle meaning 'all'

嫌 (xián)

dislike, mind

To dislike or find fault with

多 (duō)

many, much, more

Quantity word for 'many'

嫌多 (xiánduō)

think too much, mind the excess

嫌 + 多 = dislike + much

不嫌多 (bù xiánduō)

never too much

不 + 嫌多 = not + think too much

从 (cóng)

from, since

Preposition indicating starting point

从不 (cóng bù)

never

从 + 不 = from + not

一切 (yīqiè)

everything, all

一 + 切 = one + cut (everything)

只 (zhǐ)

only, just

Limiting adverb meaning 'only'

只要 (zhǐyào)

as long as, only need

只 + 要 = only + want

只为 (zhǐ wéi)

only for, just to

只 + 为 = only + for

就 (jiù)

then, just, exactly

Adverb for emphasis or sequence

就像 (jiù xiàng)

just like, exactly like

就 + 像 = just + like

就会 (jiù huì)

then will, will definitely

就 + 会 = then + will

conceptGroups.description: Words indicating location, direction, and spatial relationships

cards.back:
在 (zài)

at, in, on

Location preposition

间 (jiān)

between, among

Space between things

为 (wéi)

for, because of

Preposition indicating purpose

和 (hé)

and, with

Conjunction meaning 'and' or 'with'

与 (yǔ)

and, with

Formal conjunction meaning 'and' or 'with'

一起 (yīqǐ)

together

一 + 起 = one + rise (together)

conceptGroups.description: Measure words and classifiers used in the song

cards.back:
个 (gè)

generic classifier

General classifier for people and things

朵 (duǒ)

classifier for flowers/clouds

Classifier for flowers and cloud-like objects

颗 (kē)

classifier for small round objects

Classifier for seeds, pearls, hearts

conceptGroups.description: The most important complete phrases from the song

cards.back:
你是我的小苹果 (nǐ shì wǒ de xiǎo píngguǒ)

You are my little apple

The signature line of the song

你是我的小呀小苹果儿 (nǐ shì wǒ de xiǎo ya xiǎo píngguǒr)

You are my little oh little apple

The cute version from the chorus
cards.chineseText: 你是我的小呀小苹果儿

cards.back:
怎么爱你都不嫌多 (zěnme ài nǐ dōu bù xiánduō)

I can never love you too much

Expressing unlimited love

种下希望就会收获 (zhǒngxià xīwàng jiù huì shōuhuò)

Plant hope and you will reap

Agricultural metaphor for life
